column4: hi all - any experts on ltsp around at all - having a nightmare with edubuntu and 64bit and i386 :S
I can't get the thin client to boot from the server - it just hangs
I tried building the clients etc with arch i386 and following lots of stuff on google (changing ltsp/dhcp.conf etc) but I still get the same hanging on the thin client end
I'm not an expert on ltsp, infact i've not used it ever but can you describe any behaviour on the thin clients you see?
